name: C. Mocha and Hiking
statement:
The city where Mocha lives in is called Zhijiang. There are n+1 villages
and 2n-1 directed roads in this city. There are two kinds of roads: n-1
roads are from village i to village i+1, for all 1
leq i
leq n-1. n roads can be described by a sequence a_1,
ldots,a_n. If a_i=0, the i-th of these roads goes from village i to
village n+1, otherwise it goes from village n+1 to village i, for all 1
leq i
leq n. Mocha plans to go hiking with Taki this weekend. To avoid the
trip being boring, they plan to go through every village . They can
start and finish at any villages. Can you help them to draw up a plan?
